Title: Back to the Butcher
Writer: Ty Franck (based on the novels by), Daniel Abraham (based on the novels by), Mark Fergus (developed by), Hawk Ostby (developed by), Dan Nowak (written for television by)
Actors: Thomas Jane, Steven Strait, Cas Anvar, Dominique Tipper
Plot: The crew has survived the loss of the Canturbury and the Donnager and are contacted by an unlikely ally. Miller, on Ceres, continues his investigation and his thoughts of a conspiracy grow.
